level.heading: CHANGES IN REGISTRATION, CANCELLATION, AND FILING REQUIREMENTS (ยง 17-8909)

level.text: An amendment to a trade name registration shall be filed with the Department when a change occurs in any of the following:
The true and real name of a person conducting a business with a trade name registered under this chapter; or
The mailing address set forth on the registration or on any filed amendment; or
A notice of cancellation shall be filed with the Department when use of a trade name is discontinued.
A notice of cancellation, together with an application for registration of trade name shall be filed when:
An addition, deletion or any change of person or persons conducting or transacting business under the trade name.
There is a change in the wording or spelling of the trade name.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 10075 (November 8, 2002).
